attributes.action: To all, "If you aren't happy here, then LEAVE"
attributes.additional_details:
Let's do the same as Prime Minister Julia Gillard of Australia has said; précis follows,
Muslims who want to live under Islamic Sharia law were told: Quote: ‘IMMIGRANTS, NOT AUSTRALIANS, MUST ADAPT. Take It Or Leave It.
‘If you aren’t happy here then LEAVE. We didn’t force you to come here. You asked to be here. So accept the country YOU accepted.’
Stop Sharia law, the UK has Law already.
